channel.title: INVICTUS on akifmt
channel.description: Recent content in INVICTUS on akifmt

item.title: INVICTUS, Internship in IT Security
item.description: The company works on cyber security and security training. I also contacted my friend’s reference. The sincerity I saw from day one surprised me. I saw a full family relationship in the company, from management to employees. With the experienced team, they included them at every point by providing training on cyber security at a high-level security level, starting from scratch. The company is experienced in cyber security and even works towards becoming a world brand.
